subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] How to tell the difference,
author: Misty Dawn

Nope you are fine. Everyone hears things different. Also has alot to do wit=
h speaker setups etcetera. Spirit will adjust to you and you will gain an e=
ar to hear them better the effort you put in, the more they reciprocate.. 
=
=A0
I use bass boost x-bass stereo speakers rather than pc speakers. I neve=
r expect anyone to hear evp as I do but its always a nice surprise when the=
y do. The messages get thru to who they are supposed to one way or another.=
 
=A0
Misty

--- On Fri, 5/8/09, Diane Mehrez <deemehrez@...> wrote:
=

ll the difference,

I'm new here, so maybe I don't have the interpretations d=
own yet, but the "ispoke" file sounds like, "interest in Ronnie's folder," =
to me.
Diane





From: Misty Dawn <bulletbabea@ yahoo.com>
To: EVP-ITC@yah=
oogroups .com
Sent: Friday, May 8, 2009 10:19:01 AM
Subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] =
How to tell the difference, [1 Attachment]








It helps when they use a=
 direct response or say your name. Its part of why I prefer to use water me=
thod for my recordings, then there is no deciding what is what. I suggest y=
ou start out recording short sessions. I usually record sweep for about 3 m=
inutes at most. With water its always about 30 seconds of recording time an=
d that recording can contain 1-30 messages on -74 speed. The speech is usua=
lly very very fast, different vibration than we have and with water the spe=
ech is way outside normal human speech rates.
=A0
Attaching a recent h2o cl=
ip it should come as attachment to those getting individual emails. I dunno=
 if you will hear this so I chose a short one of someone saying "I spoke" t=
o give you some idea of what I mean. This is in the -74 speed range (slowed=
 in audacity). Good luck!
=A0
Misty

How does one tell which is onl=
y radio stations going by and spirit chat?=A0 The channels go by so quickly=
 that it's hard to tell, even now on AM, I won't know what to cut, maybe ju=
st try loading on a short tapping, but I got to learn how to slow it down I=
 guess.=A0 Sounds like people having a party in the back room, I had to tur=
n it off.=A0 I opened the door, and it was quiet, when i walked in it was l=
ike hundreds of voices!=A0 But, this could only be radio channels, even the=
 AM was just buzzing away with them, the quietest was Short wave, very few =
words, then there were a lot of Spanish people, don't know what they were t=
alking about, was a mess!
